name: .XP2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .XP2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game file used by XPilot NG, the "next generation" version of the older XPilot multiplayer 2D space fighting game; saves the 2D map as a set of polygons, each of which define different obstacles and features of the map.

content: The XP2 format replaces the older .XP format used by XPilot. XP2 files use XML formatting instead of the unstructured XP format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
